concept.title: Resolved Issues
concept.shortdesc: This topic lists resolved issues in HP Helion Eucalyptus 4.2.0.

row.entry: Issue
Description
user console: add instrcutions for connecting to instances via putty for windows users.
"Generate Administrator Credentials" needs to be moved from "Configure Eucalyptus" to "Configure Runtime Environment"
account creation page in admin guide doesn't contain account creation command
Add Help topic for Create Stack
Explain that key injection is not supported and cloud-init is used.
Update ELB console topics
Apply new names to clchost and clcport in console.ini where referenced
Network configuration MacPrefix option should not be per-cluster
Deprecate EMC in 4.2 release docs
Deprecate Multipathing in 4.2 release docs
Update Stack help
Update Buckets help topics
Document tech preview items in release notes
Misc user topic updates
Changes to Configure Mgmt Console instructions
Documented file size limit is wrong
Update screen captures in User Guide
Provide basics for security vulnerabilities in the release notes
Separate GetCredentials from eucadmin
Old versions of euca_conf and euca_admin are still in source tree
euca_conf: excessive credentials warnings should be optional
admin commands should be easier to distinguish from euca2ools commands
DescribeProperties fails to escape right angle braces
euca_conf's code sucks
Handling of credentials given at the command line is broken
Stop using M2Crypto for euca-get-credentials
Use of boto.utils.find_class buries useful exceptions
Remove euca_conf requirement and interactive commands for registration
No haproxy when no backing instances are registered
S3 DeleteObjects fails with HTTP 400 error
Walrus should support DeleteObjects
ANY queries for zone apex return SERVFAIL results
euca-describe-services doesn't support euca2ools.ini
Consolidate DNS resolution codes
S3 Multi Object Delete support
registering nodes succeeds with throwing error 8777 port
Configuring SSL ciphers for ELB
euca-get-console-output fails if cc is not avaialble
OSG S3 quota can be exceeded by concurrent PUTs
AWS Error Code InvalidVolume.NotFound Not Supported
Object storage requires active access key for eucalyptus/admin
DNS using netty w/ proper handling of any-address binding
The euca-register-service command always requires all parameters, even if unused
clean Stuck Volumes error
Simultaneous existence of registered/approved/confirmed and enabled/disabled for users is confusing
Service-centric description of services
Host-centric description of services
Endpoint-centric description of services (infra admin)
Verify check() for CC
Verify check() for NC
Non-answered recursive DNS queries from external clients should return REFUSED, not SERVFAIL
Remove www.httpproxy cloud properties
Use a system account to manage instances
Possible Resource Leak
Possible Resource Leak
Unified service image tools
Tool for listing available and installed service images
Tool for listing running service instances
Tool for installing or updating service images
Re-creating an ELB with the same name fails with 'InternalFailure' error
Eucalyptus Load Balancer Vulnerable to BEAST (Browser Exploit Against SSL/TLS) Attacks
eucanetd fails to apply network isolation rules
Install and Configure 3PAR device
ELB: Configurable protocol/ciphers
ELB: Access logs in OSG bucket
DNS : Remove legacy DNS framework
DNS : User facing DNS service
IAMGLOB : Cloud/region registration
IAMGLOB : Simple global IAM service
IAMGLOB : Global STS service
IAMGLOB : Global credentials
IAMGLOB : Region discovery
ELB: support for back-end authentication
IAMGLOB : Region specific policies
Super ugly stack traces on imaging worker launch
Long-term QA feedback and deep-dive testing
gethostbyname() is obsolete
IAM account alias in account number format should not be permitted
IAM signing certificate identifier should be derived from certificate
Refactor workflow launching/cleaning-up workers
ELB: Update Haproxy
Documentation of euimage design
Disable reporting by default
DB Server fails to start
CloudFormation JSON incorrectly wraps response
User API Service registration should be idempotent
Return serviceHosts along with ServiceIds
Default LDAP configuration is invalid JSON
Stop building the VMware broker
Upgrade to 4.2 should clean up redundant reference from network index to extant network
Stack trace logged when bucket delete fails due to not empty
Imagingbackend NOTREADY after installing service image
Remove Legacy junit DNS tests
Version bump for 4.2.0
DeleteLoadBalancerPolicy fails with ConstraintViolationException
Services in ELB instance doesn't come up properly
Slow response when using DNS service endpoints
DescribeStacks should provide "Description" with output values
Running instance failed as OSG server responded with HTTP code 403
Cloudwatch: Determine alarms and instances max usage for two nodes
Tag elb instances so euca-describe-service-images can count them
Account number should not be shown as alias when alias is deleted
Tag all service resources with service-type tag
aws-exec-read system account users should not have persistent access keys
Cloud admin services respond to v4-signed requests with 404s
Use system account to manage ELB resources
Add logging in 3par provider consistent with other block storage providers
Cleanup and refactor 3par provider
Default PermGen should be larger
Determine how much instance data can be put into the system
Classic ELB stops working after attempting to update security groups
DNS server returns SERVFAIL instead of NXDOMAIN
DNS server should distinguish NXDOMAIN from NOERROR with empty records
DNS names are treated as case sensitive in HTTP Host headers
Insecure XML parsing
Instances unable to reverse look up their public IPs
Bundle instance going storing->failed
Cannot set connection idle timeout on ELB
Accounts can delete each others' access keys given the keys' IDs
Security questionnaire (System accounts)
cannot set a keypair name to loadbalancer
Bucket DNS names broken
Binding error for imaging GetInstanceImportTaskResponseType
Document 3PAR integration
Ensure services are accessible by DNS names that begin with their AWS service names
multiple requests to imaging services makes it dysfunctional
Capacity testing of imaging worker and imaging service
ELB's policy for S3 access by LB should be more restrictive
Instance tags don't show up when using API version 2015-04-15
Cloudwatch: Refactoring for -ilities
ELB should have the latest SSL security policy set to the https/ssl listeners
Need to add back eucalyptus and walrus DNS names
Allow cloud-admins add&edit SSL security policies
Cloudwatch: put 'put metric data', 'list metrics', 'get metric statistics' in front end
cannot create default group for the user
Cloudwatch: consolidate calls to populate 'list_metrics' table
Cloud Formation region value needs sensible default
Remove 'folding' from put metric data and shift that task to callers.
ELB VM fails to restart haproxy process if there are no listeners configured
Autoscaling group for ELB fails to launch new instances
Determine differences in Cloudwatch 'insert' tasks
Port euca-describe-nodes to requestbuilder
Extra verbosity in errors from euctl
CLONE - rootwrap does not validate passed in command
CLONE - Request log records full contents for POST requests (SOAP messages, etc)
non-'eucalyptus' accounts error out when being created on multiple region cloud
ec2:Region condition no longer works when used with multiple regions
Global IAM Service: Changing the alias for an account with "global" uniqueness enforced fails
Inconsistent Error Message when importing an X.509 signing certificate into a cloud with "global" uniqueness enforced
ELB fails to put cloudwatch data
Cloudwatch: a few more optimizations
euscale-update-auto-scaling-group accepts invalid zone and makes ASG malfunction
Changes in ELB security policies are not applied to existing load balancers
Deprecated admin tools' help output should mention their status
EC2 *.NotFound error incorrect when duplicate identifiers requested
cloudwatch no longer reports system metrics/list metrics properly
Send put metric messages asynchronously for EC2 metrics
Increase number of data points (for system metrics) in put metric data
ILL: Evaluate IAM limits on Accounts

ILL: Evaluate IAM limits on Users

ILL: Evaluate STS limits on Requests?
empyrean-describe-node-controllers relies on empyrean service answering EC2 requests
VPC : Multiple Gateways : Backend update for multiple gateways
Deleting multiple listeners from ELB can cause failure to restart haproxy
esi-* should use euctl, not euca-modify-property
Try pre-fetch absolute metrics
bundle instance fails
ELB's backend instance states are not checked after CLC restart
VPC nslookup failure to resolve instance's ip from within the VM
ELB should create ASG per AZ
Empyrean service should be accessible to users authenticating with STS tokens
ELB dns resolution should be in round-robin basis
load-balancer-servo daemon crashes
500 Internal Server Error for S3 GET requests with If-None-Match and If-Modified-Since headers
ProtocolListPropertyChangeListener error logged on service start
ELB Access Log: S3BucketPrefix needs to be escaped when used
'loadbalancingbackend' in NOTREADY state after 'esi-install-image --install-default' is executed
Failed to create loadbalancer: Failed to list IAM roles
IAM error listing roles
ELB Access Logs: a user can upload logs into any bucket
IAM (Euare) policy extension no longer works
upgrade from 4.1.2 to 4.2 fails on CLC with "Failed to upgrade metadata_instances_persistent_volumes"
euca-describe-services deprecation warnings point to old names
Navigate to load balancers from the nav bar
Required fields should not be checked if a user clicks the Cancel button
If logon page is left idle, next initial logon attempt fails
Error for Unauthorized Cloud User Can Be More Accurate
Security questionnaire (GUI Monitor)
Leverage Grunt for managing the Management Console's front-end asset build pipeline
refactor policy gen tool to lazy load and be zippy
Magic Search to replace filter forms
Navigation re-work
refactor launch wizards based on what users use most often
Update Foundation
Upgrade Angular to 1.3
Use/update javascript unit-testing
Leverage Bower for front-end dependency management
ELB - Landing page
ELB - Detail page
ELB - Create wizard
ELB - Delete dialogs
ELB - Support uploading SSL certificates

Forward-slash characters are not allowed in key pairs and trigger HTTP 500
Action menu is cut off, leaving some options in-accessible
Incorporate Font Awesome for expanded iconic fonts
add "create one like this" for launch configs
Issue with the launch instance wizard image loading when CLC is changed
Invalid/misleading error message when console.ini setting 'session.secure' is set to 'false'.
update "working" animation to something that looks better
revise bubble help on sharing panel for warning re: all users grantee
Install and configure nginx for the Management Console
Magic search bar placeholder text in image picker on launch wizards is misaligned
Admin can not add new users to the account or view details of an existing account
CloudWatch charts for instances

CloudFormation - add service status to tile on dash
ELB - support for cross-zone LB

when PW is expired, after updating user is taken to wrong page

replace icons with font awesome icons

whitespace issues on login page
